definition[0]: to formally ask someone to do something
example[0]: The UN has called on both sides to observe the ceasefire.
note[0]: call on somebody to do something
definition[1]: to visit someone for a short time
example[1]: Why don’t you call on my sister when you’re in Brighton?
example[2]: She called on local employers to commit themselves to equal opportunities.
example[3]: Small booksellers often don’t have time to see all the reps who call on them.
